body:
==============================================================================
The Serendib 1.0- Designed by Sajith Dilshan | http://sajithdilshan.github.com
[Theme built for WordPress 2.8 or higher] 
[Licensed under GPL]
[July 9th 2012]

About Serendib
-----------------

Simple and clean coded blue theme which puts users content in the first place.
Theme has flexible width, with one widgetized sidebar. Theme isnpired by coderops
http://tympanus.net/codrops/

I hope you would enjoy Serendib Theme and let me know what do you think about it
Email : sajithdilshan@gmail.com

Demo of [Serendib Theme](http://workdemo.x10.mx/serendib)
================================================================================
name: Serendib
tagline: Simple and clean coded blue wordpress theme.
